Articles.Content: ksp interstellar extended is a good mod don't get me wrong but, I appear to constantly have trouble in setting up a functioning power transmission network. Ultimately it just boils down to me thinking that X will work with Y, while it actually works with Z and not realizing X requires W to work. All I'm asking for is some kind of chart/guide depicting what parts you need for both transmitting and recieving power, and for different wavelengths; perhaps even adding additional info as to which wavelength is better for atmosphere vs vaccum etc.
